pet.name: Bark Box
pet.information: Bark Box is a box of dog joy delivered monthly form the dog-obsessed Bark family directly to dogs and their people.  The classic assortment is 2 toys, 2 treats, and one chew tailor fit your dog's breed, size, and needs.  A monthly subscription is $35 a month.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $25 a month, totalling $150, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $22 a month, totalling $264, once a year.  For more infomation, go to barkbox.com.

box of the week.name: Breo Box
box of the week.information: Breo Box is a seasonal subscription service for both men and women, curated with the coolest most unique products that you never knew you needed.  A seasonal subscription is $159, four times a year.  An annual plan is $579 a year.  For more information, go to www.breobox.com.

male-baby.name: Little Bibs Box
male-baby.information: Who says baby bibs have to be boring? Litte Bibs subscription box is packed with premium softe bibs to keep your baby's clothing clean and dry, after feeding or heavy drooling.  Receive 4 specially curated designs every monnth for $19.99.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

male-child.name: We Craft Box
male-child.information: We Craft Box is an award-winning monthly kids craft kit delivered to the home of kid ages 3 to 9.  With a themed story, 4 or more coordinating crafts, easy to follow photo directions, and all the materials included, that can be shared between 2 children.  A montly subscription is $29.99 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $28.33 a month, totalling $84.99, four times a year.  A 6-month subscription is $26.67, totalling $160.56, twice a month.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $25.00 a month, totalling $300, once a year.  For infor information, go to wecraftbox.com.

male-teen.name: Craftsman Crate
male-teen.information: Craftsman Crate was born when the creator's sons told them there was nothing available for guys who wanted hands-on projects.  Well now there is.  And it's for everybody.  A monthly subscription is $33.77 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $32.77 a month, totalling $98.31, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $31.77 a month, tottalling $190.62, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $30.77 a month, totalling $369.23, once a year.  For more information, go to cratsmancrate.com.

male-adult.name: Hot Sauce of the Month Club
male-adult.information: Get the best artisan hot sauce delivered to your door each month.  Hand curated by the experts at Heat Hot Sauce Shop, only the best sauces are chosen, including many sauces that have wone awards at major hot sauce festivals.  For one classic or medium heat bottle, it's $13.99 a month.  For one hot or extra hot heat bottle, it's $15.99 a month.  For three classic or medium heat bottles, it's $28.99 a month.  For three hot or extra hot bottles, it's $34.99 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

female-baby.name: Lemon Berry
female-baby.information: With the Lemon Berry Box, you will receive 4 hand-tied boes each month.  Small bows are $13.99 a month.  Large bows are $15.99 a month.  For more informaiton, go to cratejoy.com.

female-child.name: IBBeautiful
female-child.information: IBBeautiful is thoughfully curated with the perfect items for tweens and teenage girls to realize how beautiful they are without comparison to others.  A monthly subscription is $25.00 a month.  For more information, go to www.ibbeautiful.com.

female-teen.name: Charm With Me Club
female-teen.information: Charm With Me Club will bring you the most uniquely geeky themed charms so that you can build your own bracelet to your liking.  A monthly subscription is $19.66 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $19.66 a month, totalling $58.98, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $19.33 a month, totalling $115.98, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $18.50 a month, totalling $222.00, once a year.  For more informtion, go to www.charmwithmeclub.com.

female-adult.name: Once Upon a Book Club
female-adult.information: This is a reading experience like no other.  Each month, you'll receive a newly released book and 3 to 6 wrapped gifts that are labeled wiht page numbers.  As you read, you open a gift.  A monthly subscription is $34.99 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $33.66 a month, totalling $100.98, four times a month.  A 6-month pre-paid subscripton is $33.17 a month, totalling $199.02, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $32.50 a month, totalling $390, once a year.  For more information, go to www.onceuponabookclub.com.

neutral-baby.name: Tiny Humans Read
neutral-baby.information: Tiny Humans Read is a monthly book box for kids ages 0 to 3.  Each month you'll get a collection of whimsical stories for your child to treasure.  A monthly subscription is $24.99 a month.  You can pre-pay for 3, 6, or 12 months at the $24.99 monthly price point.  For more information, go to www.tinyhumansread.com.

neutral-child.name: Green Kid Crafts
neutral-child.information: Empowering the next generation of leaders with hands-on science and art learning.  A monthly subscription is $23.95 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $23.32 a month, totalling $69.96, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $22.83 a month, totalling $$136.98, twice a year.  An annual subscription is 21.91 a month, totalling $262.92, once a year.  For more information, go to www.greenkidcraft.com.

neutral-teen.name: Smiling Socks
neutral-teen.information: You'll get fun mismatching socks delivered straight to your doorstep every month.  For 1 design a month, it's $17.95.  For 2 designs a month, it's $27.95 a month.  For 3 designs a month, it's $37.95 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

neutral-adult.name: Escape the Crate
neutral-adult.information: Now you can bring all the fun of an escape room into your home with a different time-travelling adventure delivered every other month.  Work with friends to solve the riddles and conquer the puzzles.  For 1 box over two months, it's $29.99 per box, bi-monthly.  To pre-pay for 2 boxes over 4 months, it's $28.99 per box, totalling $57.98, three times a year.  To pre-pay for 3 boxes over 6 months, it's $27.99 per box, totalling $83.97, twice a year.  To pre-pay for 6 boxes over 12 months, it's $26.50 per box, totalling $159, once a year.  For more information, go to escape-the-crate.com.
